title: Noam Chomsky: The FALSE promise of AI #ai #chomsky
description:
Renowned linguist Noam Chomsky challenges the belief that AI will surpass human intelligence. He explains the limitations of current AI and why it lacks true understanding. Discover why the future of AI might not be as revolutionary as many think in this brief yet insightful video.
Watch the full interview here: https://youtu.be/VdszZJMbBIU?si=10Qvg0A1d2iwM6ok

#NoamChomsky #AI #ArtificialIntelligence #TechDebate #FutureOfAI #practicalwisdom
